description:
The Win9x PassView utility reveals the passwords stored on your computer by Windows 95/98 operating system.

It can reveal 4 types of passwords:

* user name and the password of the current logged-on user
* cached passwords of the current logged-on user
* passwords of your network shares (Only with share-level access control)
* password of the screen saver
summary: Reveal passwords stored on your computer
author: Nir Sofer
